description.french: Débloquez toutes les autres réalisations.
description.dutch: Verdien alle andere trohpies.

description.english: Change your space blaster’s AI voice.
description.french: Changez la voix de l'IA de votre 'Space Blaster'.
description.spanish: Cambiar la voz de la IA de tu 'Space Blaster'.
description.latam: Cambiar la voz de la IA de tu 'Space Blaster'.
description.dutch: Verander de AI-stem van je 'Space Blaster'.
description.italian: Cambia la voce all''IA della tua Space Blaster.
description.portuguese: Mude a voz IA do seu space blaster.
description.brazilian: Mude a voz da IA de sua space blaster

description.french: Utilisez une grosse bombe.
description.dutch: Gebruik een grote bom.

description.english: Use brake to come to a complete stop in ‘save the colony’ mode.
description.german: Verwende die Bremse, um im 'Save the Colony' Modus zum vollständigen Stillstand zu kommen.
description.french: Utilisez le frein pour vous arrêter complètement en mode 'Save the Colony'.
description.spanish: Usa los frenos para detenerte completamente en el modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.latam: Usa los frenos para detenerte completamente en el modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.dutch: Gebruik de rem om volledig te stoppen in de modus 'Save the Colony'.
description.russian: Используйте тормоз для полной остановки в режиме «Save the Colony».
description.italian: Usa il freno per fermarti completamente in modalità 'Save the Colony'.
description.portuguese: Use o freio para parar completamente no modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.brazilian: Use o freio para uma parada completa no modo 'Save the Colony'

description.english: Rescue 1 survivor in ‘save the colony’ mode.
description.german: Rette 1 Überlebenden im 'Save the Colony' Modus.
description.french: Sauvez 1 survivant en mode 'Save the Colony'.
description.spanish: Rescata 1 superviviente en modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.latam: Rescata 1 superviviente en modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.dutch: Red 1 overlevende in de modus 'Save the Colony'.
description.russian: Спасти 1 выжившего в режиме «Save the Colony».
description.italian: Metti in salvo 1 sopravvissuto in modalità 'Save the Colony'.
description.portuguese: Resgate 1 sobrevivente no modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.brazilian: Resgate 1 sobrevivente no modo 'Save the Colony'

description.english: Rescue 10 survivors in ‘save the colony’ mode.
description.german: Rette 10 Überlebende im 'Save The Colony' Modus.
description.french: Sauvez 10 survivants en mode 'Save the Colony'.
description.spanish: Rescata 10 sobrevivientes en modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.latam: Rescata 10 sobrevivientes en modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.dutch: Red 10 overlevenden in de modus 'Save The Colony'.
description.russian: Спасите 10 выживших в режиме «Save the Colony».
description.italian: Metti in salvo 10 sopravvissuti in modalità 'Save the Colony'.
description.portuguese: Resgate 10 sobrevivente no modo 'Save the Colony'.
description.brazilian: Resgate 10 sobreviventes no modo 'Save the Colony'

description.english: Survive for 2 minutes in ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.french: Survivez pendant 2 minutes en mode 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir por 2 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.latam: Sobrevivir por 2 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.dutch: Overleef 2 minuten in de modus 'Protect Mother'.
description.russian: Выжить в течение 2 минут в режиме «Protect Mother».
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 2 minuti in modalità 'Protect Mother'.
description.portuguese: Sobreviva por 2 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva por 2 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.

description.english: Survive for 3 minutes in ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.french: Survivez pendant 3 minutes en mode 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir por 3 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.latam: Sobrevivir por 3 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.dutch: Overleef 3 minuten in de modus 'Protect Mother'.
description.russian: Выжить в течение 3 минут в режиме «Protect Mother».
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 3 minuti in modalità 'Protect Mother'.
description.portuguese: Sobreviva por 3 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva por 3 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.

description.french: Obtenez au moins 5000 points en mode 'Survival'.
description.dutch: Scoor ten minste 5.000 punten in de modus 'Survival'.

description.french: Obtenez au moins 15000 points en mode 'Survival'.
description.dutch: Scoor ten minste 15.000 punten in de modus 'Survival'.

description.french: Terminer 5 'Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi 5 'Challenges'.

description.french: Terminer 10 'Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi 10 'Challenges'.

description.french: Terminer 5 'Turbo Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi 5 'Turbo Challenges'.

description.french: Terminer 10 'Turbo Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi 10 'Turbo Challenges'.

description.english: Get a 100-point combo in ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.german: Holen Sie sich eine 100-Combo im 'Protect Mother' Modus.
description.french: Obtenez un combo de 100 points en mode 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Obtener Combo de 100 puntos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.latam: Obtener Combo de 100 puntos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.dutch: Verkrijg een 100-combo in de modus 'Protect Mother'.
description.italian: Esegui una combo da 100 punti in modalità 'Protect Mother'.
description.portuguese: Obtenha um combo de 100 pontos no modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um combo de 100 pontos no modo 'Protect Mother'.

description.french: Achetez quelque chose dans la boutique.
description.dutch: Koop iets in de winkel.

description.english: Buy something from the mini shop.
description.french: Achetez quelque chose dans la mini-boutique.
description.dutch: Koop iets van de 'mini-shop'.

description.english: Unleash the darkness punishment in ‘to the death’ mode.
description.german: Entfessle die dunkle Bestrafung im 'To the Death' Modus.
description.french: Déchaînez la punition des ténèbres en mode 'To the Death'.
description.spanish: Desencadena el castigo oscuro en modo 'To the Death'.
description.latam: Desencadena el castigo oscuro en modo 'To the Death'.
description.dutch: Laat de duistere straf los in de modus 'To the Death'.
description.russian: Выпустите наказание тьмы в режиме «To the Death».
description.italian: Libera la punizione oscura in modalità 'To the Death'.
description.portuguese: Desencadeie a punição obscura no modo 'To the Death'.
description.brazilian: Libere a punição das trevas no modo 'To the Death'

description.english: Win a round in ‘one shot’ mode with one ammo remaining for the winner.
description.french: Gagnez une manche en mode 'One Shot' avec une seule munition restante.
description.spanish: Gana una ronda en modo 'One Shot' con una sola munición restante para el ganador.
description.latam: Gana una ronda en modo 'One Shot' con una sola munición restante para el ganador.
description.dutch: Win een ronde in modus 'One Shot' en laat de winnaar met 1 munitie achter.
description.russian: Выиграйте раунд в режиме «One Shot», оставив один боеприпас для победителя.
description.italian: Vinci un round in modalità 'One Shot' con solo un proiettile rimanente per il vincitore.
description.portuguese: Ganhe uma rodada no modo 'One Shot' com uma única munição restante para o vencedor.
description.brazilian: No modo 'One Shot' vença uma rodada restando apenas um disparo

displayName.french: Un navire tout beau, tout neuf

description.french: Achetez un 'Space Blaster'.
description.dutch: Koop een 'Space Blaster'.

description.german: Starten Sie den 'Space Blaster' eines Kameraden neu.
description.french: Relancez le 'Space Blaster' d'un camarade.
description.spanish: Relanzar un 'Space Blaster' de un compañero.
description.latam: Relanzar un 'Space Blaster' de un compañero.
description.dutch: Start de 'Space Blaster' van een kameraad opnieuw.
description.portuguese: Relance um space blaster de um companheiro.
description.brazilian: Relance uma space blaster de um companheiro.

description.english: Survive for 4 minutes in ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.french: Survivez pendant 4 minutes en mode 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir por 4 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.latam: Sobrevivir por 4 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.dutch: Overleef 4 minuten in de modus 'Protect Mother'.
description.russian: Выжить в течение 4 минут в режиме «Protect Mother».
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 4 minuti in modalità 'Protect Mother'
description.portuguese: Sobreviva por 4 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva por 4 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother'.

description.english: Survive for 5 minutes in co-op ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.german: Überlebe 5 Minuten im Co-Op 'Protect Mother' Modus.
description.french: Survivez pendant 5 minutes en mode Co-Op local 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Sobrevivir por 5 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother' cooperativo.
description.latam: Sobrevivir por 5 minutos en modo 'Protect Mother' cooperativo.
description.dutch: Overleef 5 minuten in lokale coöp 'Protect Mother' -modus.
description.russian: Выжить в течение 5 минут в режиме кооператива «Protect Mother».
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 5 minuti in modalità cooperativa 'Protect Mother'
description.portuguese: Sobreviva por 5 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother' cooperativo.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva por 5 minutos no modo 'Protect Mother' cooperativo.

description.french: Obtenez au moins 25000 points en mode 'Survival'.
description.dutch: Scoor ten minste 25.000 punten in de modus 'Survival'.

description.german: Erziele mindestens 30.000 Punkte im Co-Op 'Survival' Modus.
description.french: Obtenez  au moins 30000 points en mode Co-Op local 'Survival'.
description.dutch: Scoor ten minste 30.000 punten in de lokale coöp 'Survival' -modus.

description.english: Defeat the boss in survival mode.
description.french: Battez le boss en mode 'Survival'.
description.dutch: Versla de baas in de modus 'Survival'.

description.english: Defeat the boss in co-op ‘save the colony’ mode.
description.german: Besiege den Boss im Co-Op 'Save the Colony' Modus.
description.french: Battez le boss en mode Co-Op local 'Save the Colony'.
description.spanish: Derrotar al Jefe en modo 'Save the Colony' cooperativo.
description.latam: Derrotar al Jefe en modo 'Save the Colony' cooperativo.
description.dutch: Versla de baas in de lokale coöp 'Save the Colony' -modus.
description.russian: Победить босса в кооперативном режиме «Save the Colony».
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss in modalità cooperativa 'Survival'.
description.portuguese: Derrote o chefão no modo 'Save the Colony' cooperativo.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefão no modo 'Save the Colony' cooperativo

description.french: Achetez tous les 'Space Blasters'.
description.dutch: Koop alle 'Space Blasters'.

description.french: Achetez tout dans la boutique.
description.dutch: Koop alles in de winkel.
description.italian: Compra tutti gli oggetti presenti nel negozio.

description.french: Voir tous les ennemis.
description.dutch: Zie alle vijanden.
description.italian: Incontra tutti i nemici presenti nel gioco.

description.german: Spare 100 Credits auf der Bank an.
description.french: Économisez 100 crédits à la banque.
description.dutch: Spaar 100 credits op de bank.

description.french: Terminez toutes les 'Space Missions'.
description.dutch: Voltooi alle 'Space Missions'.

description.french: Terminez tous les 'Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi alle 'Challenges'.

description.french: Terminez tous les 'Turbo-Challenges'.
description.dutch: Voltooi alle 'Turbo Challenges'.

description.english: Defeat the boss & rescue all 33 survivors in 1 player ‘save the colony’ mode.
description.german: Besiege den Boss und rette alle 33 Überlebenden im 1-Spieler 'Save the Colony' Modus.
description.french: Vaincre le boss et sauver les 33 survivants en mode 1 joueur 'Save the Colony'.
description.spanish: Derrota al Jefe y rescata a los 33 sobrevivientes en modo 'Save the Colony' de 1 jugador.
description.latam: Derrota al Jefe y rescata a los 33 sobrevivientes en modo 'Save the Colony' de 1 jugador.
description.dutch: Versla de baas en red alle 33 overlevenden in de modus 'Save the Colony' met 1 speler.
description.russian: Убейте босса и спасите всех 33 выживших в режиме 1 игрока в режиме «Save the Colony».
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss e salva tutti i 33 sopravvissuti in modalità single-player 'Save the Colony'.
description.portuguese: Derrote o chefão e resgate todos os 33 sobreviventes no modo 'Save the Colony' de 1 jogador.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefão e resgate todos os 33 sobreviventes no modo 'Save the Colony' para 1 jogador.

description.english: Score 60,000 in ‘survival mode’ or ‘protect mother’ mode.
description.german: Erziele mindestens 60.000 Punkte im 'Survival' Modus oder 'Protect Mother' Modus.
description.french: Obtenez au moins 60000 points en mode 'Survival' ou en mode 'Protect Mother'.
description.spanish: Obtener 60,000 puntos en modo 'Survival' o 'Protect Mother'.
description.latam: Obtener 60,000 puntos en modo 'Survival' o 'Protect Mother'.
description.dutch: Scoor ten minste 60.000 punten in de modus 'Survial' of de modus 'Protect Mother'.
description.italian: Ottieni 60.000 punti in modalità 'Survival' o 'Protect Mother'.
description.portuguese: Obtenha 60,000 pontos nos modos 'Survival' ou 'Protect Mother'.
description.brazilian: Alcance 60,000 pontos nos modos 'Survival' ou 'Protect Mother'.
